reviewText:
The ultimate boxer. His colleagues called him the best pound for pound boxer of all time.
Joe Louis,Muhamad Ali,Archie Moore,all agreed he was the best. Boxer,slugger,lightning speed,punching accuracy!
Most of the available fight films of Sugar Ray Robinson's middleweight career are included in this collection. Each DVD has nice labeling and I even got one bonus DVD for free! Thanks, Loraine!
